comments.text: I will wear green, what about you?

It's a usual delay for me to arrive. he hype really exists for a reason. Most of my expectations were met and some were even exceeded by my experience at this school. There's a lot of reviews and advice about USC out there, but one thing I would say is this: if you are the kind of person who can easily feel lonely or isolated in a new city or institution, this is the place for you. Making friends is literally so easy here and it is very unlikely for someone to feel a low sense of community here. Fight On!

I loved Stevens and the engineering curriculum.

I recently completed my first semester at USC and I gotta say, the hype really exists for a reason. Most of my expectations were met and some were even exceeded by my experience at this school. There's a lot of reviews and advice about USC out there, but one thing I would say is this: if you are the kind of person who can easily feel lonely or isolated in a new city or institution, this is the place for you. Making friends is literally so easy here and it is very unlikely for someone to feel a low sense of community here. Fight On!
